mapper.insert: insert into Content(title, remark, artical, picture, price) VALUES (#{title}, #{remark}, #{artical}, #{picture}, #{price})
mapper.delete: delete from Content where id = #{id} and id not in (select contentId from OrderContent) and id not in (select ContentId from Cart)
mapper.update: update Content set title = #{title}, remark = #{remark}, artical = #{artical}, picture = #{picture}, price = #{price} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, title, remark, artical, picture, A.price, ifnull(sum(B.cnt),0) as cnt from Content A left join OrderContent B on A.id = B.contentId where A.id = #{id}
select id, title, remark, artical, picture, A.price, ifnull(sum(B.cnt),0) as cnt from Content A left join OrderContent B on A.id = B.contentId group by A.id
